name: North Miami
description: Expert licensed electricians serving North Miami, Florida. Solomon Electric provides professional residential and commercial electrical services throughout North Miami, from Biscayne Blvd to Florida International University's Biscayne Bay Campus.

challenges.title: Coastal Electrical Issues
challenges.description: North Miami's proximity to the bay means salt air can accelerate corrosion on outdoor electrical components and service masts, requiring marine-grade materials.

challenges.title: Historic Home Wiring
challenges.description: Many properties in established North Miami neighborhoods feature original cloth wiring or outdated panels that need modernization to meet current safety codes.

challenges.title: Storm Preparedness
challenges.description: Low-lying areas of North Miami are prone to flooding during heavy tropical storms, making proper GFCI protection and elevated electrical systems critical.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in North Miami?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout North Miami including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all North Miami neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in North Miami?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Miami-Dade County permits for electrical work in North Miami, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my North Miami home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many North Miami homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout North Miami.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in North Miami?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all North Miami neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you provide emergency electrical services in North Miami?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency electrical services to all North Miami residents and businesses. Whether you're in Keystone Islands or Arch Creek, our licensed electricians respond quickly to urgent issues like power loss, sparking panels, or burning smells.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in North Miami?
faqs.answer: Yes, Solomon Electric is a fully licensed and insured electrical contractor (FL License #EC13012419). We serve all of Miami-Dade County, including the City of North Miami, and ensure all work meets Florida Building Code and NEC standards.

faqs.question: Can you help with salt air corrosion on my electrical system?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. North Miami homes near the water often suffer from salt air corrosion. We specialize in installing corrosion-resistant outdoor panels, GFCI outlets, and lighting fixtures designed to withstand the South Florida coastal environment.

seoContent.heading: Your Trusted North Miami Residential & Commercial Electrician
seoContent.body: North Miami is one of South Florida's most diverse and established communities. From the cultural hub of MOCA to the natural beauty of Oleta River State Park, North Miami requires electrical expertise that understands both historic estates and modern developments. Solomon Electric has been a staple in the Miami-Dade community for over 15 years, providing safe, reliable, and professional electrical solutions for every type of property.

seoContent.heading: Understanding North Miami's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: North Miami homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Miami-Dade County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to North Miami's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your North Miami Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout North Miami. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Serving Every Neighborhood in North Miami
seoContent.body: Whether you live in the waterfront Keystone Islands, the historic Arch Creek area, or near the FIU Biscayne Bay Campus, Solomon Electric is just a phone call away. We understand the specific municipal requirements of North Miami and handle everything from permit acquisition to final inspection, ensuring your project is compliant and safe.
